page.title: 14FOOD IN JERSEY
page.content: We eat a lot of "junk" food. Junk food is stuff like hamburgers, beefburgers, take-aways and "Wimpeys". We also eat a lot of frozen food stuff like frozen vegetables, and we eat a lot of convenience foods. They come in packets like potatoes, cakes and types of pastries. Vegetables and fruit come in tins and are very useful for old and busy people. Convenience foods, as their name suggests, are very convenient for an old or single person. Now more and more tinned, canned, packet and frozen foods have chemical colours added to them. It has been found that some colours can make hyperactive children worse, and some people are allergic to them. Living on an island like Jersey, fresh produce is almost always around. Jersey potatoes are the most famous produce because of their sweet taste.
